name: Sunset Timelapse Flight:  Ukraine International 737-900ER, Kiev to Tbilisi
description:
A full sunset timelapse flight from Kiev, Ukraine to Tbilisi, Georgia onboard a Ukraine International 737-900ER, operating flight PS517 on 28 May 2015.

**Full flight in real time: https://youtu.be/tihmgoxum2g **

There is a delay to our departure due to the bags not yet being onboard, but once they are loaded we are away very quickly on our way.

Our routing initially takes us directly south towards the Black Sea, before making a 90 degree turn directly east towards Georgia, to avoid the conflict zone of eastern Ukraine.  The sun sets over the Black Sea as we head east, and we fly in darkness for an hour before beginning our approach and landing into Tbilisi.  After landing we backtrack the entire length of the runway and take our parking stand next to a cargo 747.

Video is taken from seat 14F.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
